metadata.title: CVE-2024-20968 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-20968` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient21 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-client - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-client-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-client-core-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-router - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-server - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-server-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-server-core-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-source-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
mysql-testsuite-8.0 - 8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.0.35-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
mariadb-10.6 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
